def main():
    """
    Run the experiment
    """
    experiment.create(name='capsule_network_mnist')
    conf = Configs()
    experiment.configs(conf, {'optimizer.optimizer': 'Adam',
                              'optimizer.learning_rate': 1e-3})

    experiment.add_pytorch_models({'model': conf.model})

    with experiment.start():
        conf.run()
